data.value: Please provide a valid email address which includes an '@'-sign as well as a domain (i.e. '.com').

data.value: Sorry, an error occurred on and we couldn't process that request.

data.name: NewUserGetPassword
data.value: Please enter a password meeting the following criteria: - at least 12 characters long - at least 1 uppercase non-numeric character - at least 1 lowercase non-numeric character - at least 1 numeric character - at least one special character

data.name: PasswordMustHaveNecessaryComponents
data.value: Please provide a 4 to 20 character-length password containing letters, numbers, one uppercase letter, and one special character.

data.name: PasswordNotEmptyMessage
data.value: Please provide a password that is not empty.

data.name: PasswordNotValidGenericMessage
data.value: Please provide a valid password.

data.name: UserOptionsForLoggedInUser
data.value:
*********************************************************** Login Status: Logged In
Please select one of the options below: - Press [4] to view recent transactions - Press [5] to deposit money - Press [6] to withdraw money - Press [3] to sign out and exit ***********************************************************

data.name: UserOptionsForNonLoggedInUser
data.value:
*********************************************************** Login Status: Not Logged In
Please select on of the following options: - Press [1] to log into the system. - Press [2] to create a new account. - Press [3] to exit ***********************************************************

data.name: UserOptionsForUnsuccessfulUser
data.value: Would you like to continue banking or call it a day? - type [8] to keep going - type [3] to exit the system
